about_the_game:
Welcome to the Wonderful World of Catly!

Join your furry companions to explore, craft, and build the island of your dreams. Meet a variety of cats and charming characters, invite island residents, pets, and even your friends to visit, live and host fun parties here. Explore freely and have endless fun with your cats!

Key Features

  • Explore a Seamless Open World. The game offers an online mode where official servers allow players from around the world to explore and collaborate together in a 3D open world.

  • Adopt and Raise Cats. Rescue and adopt cats you encounter in the Catly world! Bring them home and create a warm, cozy haven together. Care for them, feed, and play to strengthen your bond, unlocking new abilities and becoming the closest of companions.

  • Build Connections with the Locals. Meet various island residents and cats, help them solve challenges, and grow your bond with them. As your relationships deepen, unlock new island areas and get rare tools!

  • A Thriving Farm Life. Enjoy the harvest through your hard work! Grow beautiful flowers to decorate your home or gift to friends, gather ingredients to cook delicious meals for the residents, friends, and your cats. Plant crops and fruit trees, fish, and dive for resources to support your island's development.

  • Endless Creativity. With easy-to-use templates and tools, you can design personalized outfits, furniture, houses, and gardens. Share and showcase your creations with the world and friends, and become a creative tycoon!

  • Build Your Dream Island. Expand and build your island over time. Craft new homes, furniture, and gardens. Create a comfortable paradise for you and your furry companions!

  • Cat Adventures and Cooperation. Step into an adventure with your cats or team up with your friends' cats to take a variety of fun challenges. Traveling with exciting vehicles. Each cat has its own strengths, offering unique advantages during different challenges!

Love from the Industry

"This cat MMO is a triumph of innovation and heart, delivering an enchanting world that stands as a testament to the brilliance of its creators."

THOMAS VU, Producer of League of Legends, Producer of Arcane, 2022 Emmy Awards Winner.

"A game as beautiful as Catly, deserves beautiful melodies. I am beyond excited to craft heart warming music for Catly and all of you cat lovers out there."

AKIRA SENJU, Four-Time Japan Academy Award Winner, Lead Composer of Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood, Lead Composer of Catly.

"I didn't think I would be excited about a game about cats, but here we are."

BEN BRODE, Game Director of Hearthstone, Two-Time The Game Awards Winner.

Build your dream island, meet various characters, and enjoy caring for your cats, dressing up, building, farming, racing, skiing, and much more! Explore freely and have endless fun with your furry companions!
